landing.headline: You’re not here by accident.
landing.description: This is where artificial intelligence meets your consciousness.

welcome.hello: Welcome to the space of Self
welcome.description: In one or a few sentences, describe yourself. This is the beginning of your echo.

about_you.placeholder: For example: I feel more than I know how to say...

confirm.delete_account_description: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?

campfires.no_campfires: No campfire has been lit yet. Light the first one.
campfires.start_fire_hint: Musisz wybrać co najmniej jednego kompana, by nazwać ognisko.
